name: MLB The Show 21
summary: MLB The Show 21 is an upcoming baseball video game by San Diego Studio and published by Sony Interactive Entertainment for the PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4 and by MLB for the Xbox Series X/S and Xbox One. MLB The Show is based on Major League Baseball (MLB). The sixteenth entry of the MLB: The Show franchise, it is set to be released on April 20, 2021. San Diego Padres shortstop Fernando Tatís Jr. is featured as the cover star, and at age 22 is the youngest player to do so.
